title: Get to Know Me 'REN'
name: Muhammad Rafi Ediananta
about: I'm a highly motivated fourth-year Telecommunications Engineering student 📡 at Misr University For Science and Technology (MUST) 🏛. With 20+ Technology Skills Certifications, experience in 7+ IT & Telecommunications Projects, and leadership roles as a Vice Coordinator of a Research Laboratory and Cybersecurity Research Assistant for 2+ years 🛡️. I am an awardee of scholarships such as the Bank Indonesia Scholarship 2023 🏅 and FIFGroup Young Leader 2023 🏆, with 8+ months of internship experience as a DevOps Engineer and Quality Assurance Engineer 💼. My academic performance boasts a GPA of 3.76 📚, and I am recognized as an outstanding student of the Electrical Engineering Faculty 2024/2025 🌟. A passionate learner, I am always eager to explore new technologies and leverage them to solve real-life problems ✨, currently focusing on Artificial Intelligence 🤖 and Software Development 🔗.
